member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the ALTO (Analyzed Layout and Text Object) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AltoXmlDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ApplicationDescription
member.summary: Application description setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The application description setting for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.FileName
member.summary: File name for the ALTO document.
member.value: A The file name for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.FirstPhysicalPageNumber
member.summary: First physical page number setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The first physical page number setting for the ALTO document. Default value is 1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.AltoXml.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Formatted
member.summary: Produce a formatted XML document.
member.value: **true** to produce a formatted XML document, otherwise; **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Indentation
member.summary: Indentation string to use when producing a formatted XML document.
member.value: The indentation string to use when producing a formatted XML document. Default value is `" "`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.MeasurementUnit
member.summary: Measurement unit for the ALTO document.
member.value: The measurement unit for the ALTO document. Default value is AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.MM10

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.PlainText
member.summary: Discards font information so the text will be written without any font style.
member.value: **true** to discard font information, causing the text to be written without any font style; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ProcessingAgency
member.summary: Processing agency for the ALTO document.
member.value: The processing agency for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ProcessingDateTime
member.summary: Processing date/time for the ALTO document.
member.value: The processing date/time for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ProcessingStepDescription
member.summary: Processing step description for the ALTO document.
member.value: The Processing step description for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ProcessingStepSettings
member.summary: Processing step settings for the ALTO document.
member.value: The processing step settings for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ShowGlyphInfo
member.summary: Shows the extra information that can be displayed for each glyph (position, bounding rectangle).
member.value: **true** to show the extra information that can be displayed for each glyph (position, bounding rectangle); otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ShowGlyphVariants
member.summary: Display variants for some glyphs if the input is text from OCR.
member.value: **true** to display variants for some glyphs if the input is text from OCR; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.SoftwareCreator
member.summary: Software creator setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The software creator setting for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.SoftwareName
member.summary: Software name setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The software name setting for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.SoftwareVersion
member.summary: Software version setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The software version setting for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Sort
member.summary: Sorts text from top-left to bottom-right.
member.value: **true** to sort text from top-left to bottom-right in the output document; otherwise, **false** to save data into the output file in the same order as the input data. The default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Microsoft Word 2003 document format (DOC) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Doc.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocDocumentOptions.TextMode
member.summary: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOC file.
member.value: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOC file. Default value is DocumentTextMode.Auto.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions
member.summary: Abstract base class that provides functionality common to all the format option classes in the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution
member.summary: Document resolution (in dots per inch) of the resulting document.
member.value: Document resolution value given in dots per inch unit and it controls the dimensions of the resulting document. Default value is 0 (use the resolution of the actual page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageHeight
member.summary: Document empty page height.
member.value: A double value that indicates the height of an empty page in inches. Default value is 11.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageResolution
member.summary: Resolution (in dots per inch) of the document empty page.
member.value: Document resolution value given in dots per inch unit and it controls the dimensions of the empty page. Default value is 0 (use the current screen resolution).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageWidth
member.summary: Document empty page width.
member.value: A double value that indicates the width of an empty page in inches. Default value is 8.5

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return the DocumentFormat associated with the derived class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: Maintain the aspect ratio of the original emf file.
member.value: **true** to maintain the aspect so the created document will have the same aspect ratio of the original emf file; **false**, otherwise.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions.PageRestriction
member.summary: Indicates whether there can be blank pages and overlay images.
member.value: A DocumentPageRestriction enumeration member that specifies the current document page restriction.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentProgressEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the DocumentWriter.Progress event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentProgressEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new DocumentProgressEventArgs object with given parameters.
member.param: Progress percentage value (from 0 to 100).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentProgressEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Allow the user to cancel the current operation.
member.value: **true** to cancel the current operation; **false** to continue the current operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentProgressEventArgs.Percentage
member.summary: Gets the value, in percent, of the completion for the current operation.
member.value: A number between 0 and 100 that indicates in percent how close to finishing the current operation is.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter
member.summary: Support for creating document files such as PDF, XPS, DOC, HTML, RTF, or Text from Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), Windows Enhanced Meta Files (EMF) or raster images.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the DocumentWriter class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.AddPage(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterPage)
member.summary: Adds a new page to current document being created.
member.param: The new page properties

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.AppendLtd(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends one LEADTOOLS Temporary Document (LTD) file to another.
member.param: The source LTD file.
The destination LTD file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.BeginDocument(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Creates a new document stream and prepares it for the new pages to be added.
member.param: The stream that will contain the new document file.
The format of the new document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.BeginDocument(System.String,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Creates a new document file and prepares it for the new pages to be added.
member.param: The name of the new document file.
The format of the new document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.Convert(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Converts a document stream from the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document (LTD) format to a stream that will contain the data in any of the formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writer.
member.param: The stream containing existing LTD format data.
The stream that will contain the data of the converted document file.
The format of the converted document file to be created. This parameter cannot be DocumentFormat.Ltd.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.Convert(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Converts a document file or stream from the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document (LTD) format to a file or stream that will contain the data in any of the formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writer.
member.param: The name of the file containing existing LEADTOOLS Temporary Document format (LTD) data. Either *ltdFileName* or *ltdStream* must not be **null**.
The stream containing existing LTD format data. Either *ltdFileName* or *ltdStream* must not be **null**.
The name of the file that will contain the data of the converted document file. Either *outputFileName* or *outputStream* must not be **null**.
The stream that will contain the data of the converted document file. Either *outputFileName* or *outputStream* must not be **null**.
The format of the converted document file to be created. This parameter cannot be DocumentFormat.Ltd.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.Convert(System.String,System.String,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Converts a document file from the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document format to a file of any of the formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writer.
member.param: The name of an existing LEADTOOLS Temporary Document Format file on disk.
The name of the converted document file to be created.
The format of the converted document file to be created. This parameter cannot be DocumentFormat.Ltd.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.EndDocument
member.summary: Finalize the document being created on disk.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.GetFormatFileExtension(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the default file extension for the specified document format.
member.param: The document format requested.
member.returns: A String containing the file extension for the specified format (without the ".").

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.GetFormatFriendlyName(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the friendly name of the specified document format.
member.param: The document format requested.
member.returns: A String containing the friendly name for the specified format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.GetLtdInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets information on an LTD file on disk.
member.param: Path to the LTD file on disk.
member.returns: An LtdDocumentInfo object containing the information on the LTD file. Or **null** if the file does not contain LTD data.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.GetOptions(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.param: The document format.
member.returns: The document options for this format. Note that the returned object from the base DocumentOptions class needs to be cast to one of the derived classes based on *format*.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.GetSupportedFormats
member.summary: Gets an array containing the supported formats.
member.returns: An array containing the supported formats.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.InsertPage(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterPage,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a new page to current document being created.
member.param: The new page properties
1-based number of \page\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.LoadOptions(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads the document options from an XML stream.
member.param: A standard .NET Stream containing the options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.LoadOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the document options from an XML file on disk.
member.param: The name of XML file containing the options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.SaveOptions(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the document options to an XML stream.
member.param: A standard .NET Stream to save the options to.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.SaveOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the document options to an XML file on disk.
member.param: The name of XML file to save the options to.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.SetOptions(Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentOptions)
member.summary: Sets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.param: The document format.
An instance of an object derived from DocumentOptions. The remarks section lists the various document formats and the derived object that can be used.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter.UpdateMetaFileResolution(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the resolution of an existing Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF).
member.param: Handle to the source EMF
New horizontal resolution
New vertical resolution
member.returns: A handle to the modified Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF).

member.summary: Document writer progress notification event.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentWriterEmfPage

member.summary: LEADTOOLS Annotation container that contains the objects to use when annotating a page in PDF documents.
member.value: An optional Object that must point to a valid instance of AnnContainer class containing the objects to use when annotating a page in PDF documents. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterEmfPage.EmfHandle
member.summary: The Windows Enhanced Meta File handle representation of the page.
member.value: An IntPtr structure that contains the unmanaged handle to the Windows Enhanced Meta File object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterEmfPage.Image
member.summary: The image used for creating a PDF document page with the image and text overlay feature.
member.value: A RasterImage that contains the optional raster image to use to create a PDF page with the image/text overlay feature. If this feature is not used, this property must be set to **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterEmfPage.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page (DocumentWriterPageType.Emf).

member.summary: Page height in inches.
member.value: Page height in inches. Default value is 11.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterEmptyPage.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page (DocumentWriterPageType.Empty).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriterEmptyPage.Width
member.summary: Page width in inches.
member.value: Page width in inches. Default value is 8.5.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocxDocumentOptions class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocxDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Docx.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocxDocumentOptions.TextMode
member.summary: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOCX file.
member.value: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOCX file. Default value is DocumentTextMode.Auto.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.EmfDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Windows Enhanced Meta File (EMF) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.EmfDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EmfDocumentOptions class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.EmfDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Emf.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the HyperText Markup Language (HTML) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HtmlDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color.
member.value: A RasterColor structure that contains the background color to use in the final HTML document. Default value is "White".

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.DocumentType
member.summary: Type of the HTML file created using the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.
member.value: One of the HtmlDocumentType enumeration members that indicate which type of HTML file the resulting HTML file will be.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.EmbedCSS
member.summary: Indicate whether CSS elements are to be embedded in the document.
member.value: **true** to embed the CSS elements in the final document. Otherwise, **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.EmbedFonts
member.summary: Indicates whether fonts are to be embedded in the document.
member.value: **true** to embed the fonts in the final HTML document. Otherwise, **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.EmbedImages
member.summary: Indicate whether images are to be embedded in the document.
member.value: **true** to embed images in the final HTML document. Otherwise, **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.FontEmbedMode
member.summary: Font embedding mode used when creating an HTML document.
member.value: One of the DocumentFontEmbedMode enumeration members that indicate which font embedding mode to use when creating an HTML document. Default value is DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.FontTypes
member.summary: Font types to embed in the document.
member.value: Font types to embed in the document. Default value is DocumentFontTypes.WOFF1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Html.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.ImageType
member.summary: Format to use when saving images in the document
member.value: Format to use when saving images in the document. Default value is RasterImageFormat.Png.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentOptions.UseBackgroundColor
member.summary: Indicates whether the HTML document will use the a background color or not.
member.value: **true** to use the background color in the HTML document; **false**, otherwise.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document (LTD) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LtdDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Ltd.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.MobDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Mobipocket e-book format (MOB) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.MobDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MobDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.MobDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.MobDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Mob.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF).

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PdfDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.AnnotationsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether annotations and comments can be added to the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add annotations and comments to the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.AssemblyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether pages can be added or removed from the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add or remove pages from the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Author
member.summary: Author value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document author (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the author value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.AutoBookmarks
member.summary: List of the current auto bookmarks options.
member.value: A list of PdfAutoBookmark that represent the auto-bookmarking settings used when creating PDF documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.AutoBookmarksEnabled
member.summary: Use automatic bookmarking in the final PDF document
member.value: **true** to allow bookmarks to be created using automatic bookmarking, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.CenterWindow
member.summary: Indicates if the initial view should center the document in the window
member.value: **true** if initial view should center the document in the window, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.ColoredImageCompression
member.summary: Type of compression to use on colored images when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the ColoredImageCompressionType enumeration members that indicate which type of compression to use on colored images when creating a PDF document. The default value is ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpeg.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.CopyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document has access rights to copy text.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to copy text from the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Creator
member.summary: Creator value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A string which contains the PDF document's creator (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the creator value, use either an

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.CustomBookmarks
member.summary: List of the custom (user) bookmarks to use when creating PDF documents.
member.value: A list of PdfCustomBookmark that represent the custom (user) bookmarks to add to the final PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayDocTitle
member.summary: Indicates that the initial view should display the document title.
member.value: **true** if the initial view should display the document title, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.DocumentType
member.summary: PDF file type created using the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentType enumeration members that indicate which type of PDF file will be created. Default value is PdfDocumentType.Pdf

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.EditEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document can be edited.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to edit the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.EncryptionMode
member.summary: Encryption mode to use when creating the PDF document.
member.value: A PdfDocumentEncryptionMode enumeration member that specifies which encryption mode to use when creating the PDF document. Default value is PdfDocumentEncryptionMode.RC128Bit.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWindow
member.summary: Indicates if the initial view should fit the document in the window
member.value: **true** if initial view should fit the document in the window, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.FontEmbedMode
member.summary: Font embedding mode used when creating an PDF document.
member.value: One of the DocumentFontEmbedMode enumeration members that indicate which font embedding mode to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Pdf.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.HideMenubar
member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the menu bar
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the menu bar, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.HideToolbar
member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the toolbar
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the toolbar, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.HideWindowUI
member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the window user interface elements
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the window user interface elements, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.HighQualityPrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document can be printed in high quality.
member.value: **true** to allow allow external viewers and editors to print the resulting PDF document in high quality, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverText
member.summary: Indicates whether to use a raster image overlay on top of the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to use a raster image overlay on top of the resulting PDF document; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverTextMode
member.summary: Indicates how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text).
member.value: A value that indicates how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text). Default value is DocumentImageOverTextMode.Strict

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverTextSize
member.summary: Resize options for the overlay image (image over text).
member.value: A value that indicates the resize options for the overlay image (image over text). Default value is DocumentImageOverTextSize.Original

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.InitialPageNumber
member.summary: Initial view page number to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view page number to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (go to the first page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Keywords
member.summary: Keywords to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the keywords associated with the PDF document. To reset the keywords value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Linearized
member.summary: Create a PDF document that is optimized for fast web viewing.
member.value: **true** to create a PDF document optimized for fast web viewing, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.OneBitImageCompression
member.summary: One bit compression type used to compress one bit per pixel images when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the OneBitImageCompressionType enumeration members that indicate which one bit compression type to use for compressing one bit per pixel images when creating a PDF document. The default value is OneBitImageCompressionType.Jbig2.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.OwnerPassword
member.summary: Owner password value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String that contains the user password value to be used. To reset the owner password, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.PageFitType
member.summary: Initial view page fit type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageFitType enumeration members that indicate the initial view page fit type mode to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageFitType.Default.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.PageLayoutType
member.summary: Initial view page layout type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageLayoutType enumeration members that indicate the initial view layout of page mode to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.SinglePageDisplay.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.PageModeType
member.summary: Initial view page mode type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageModeType enumeration members that indicate the initial view page mode type to use to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageModeType.PageOnly.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.PrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document has access rights to allow printing.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to print the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Producer
member.summary: Producer value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A string which contains the PDF document's producer (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the producer value, use either an

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Protected
member.summary: Create a protected PDF document.
member.value: **true** to create a protected PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.QualityFactor
member.summary: Degree of loss in the compression process. This applies to JPEG compression only.
member.value: A QualityFactor determines the degree of loss in the compression process. The default value is 80.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Subject
member.summary: Subject value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document subject to be used. To reset the subject value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.Title
member.summary: Title value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document title to be used. To reset the title value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.TotalBookmarkLevels
member.summary: Total number of bookmark levels for created PDF documents.
member.value: A TotalBookmarkLevels determines the total number of bookmark levels for created PDF documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.UserPassword
member.summary: User password value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String that contains the user password value to be used. To reset the user password, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.XCoordinate
member.summary: Initial view X coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view X coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (left of the page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.YCoordinate
member.summary: Initial view Y coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view Y coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (top of the page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentOptions.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Initial view zoom percentage to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view zoom percentage to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (actual size).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PubDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the eBooks Format (ePUB).

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PubDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PubDocumentOptions class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PubDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Pub.

member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Rich Text Format (RTF).

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.RtfDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Rtf.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.RtfDocumentOptions.TextMode
member.summary: Indicates how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting RTF file.
member.value: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting RTF file. Default value is DocumentTextMode.Auto.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.SvgDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) format.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document to a text file using the LEADTOOLS DocumentWriter.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.AddPageBreak
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting text file should have page breaks.
member.value: **true** to add page breaks in the final text document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.AddPageNumber
member.summary: Get or sets a value that indicates whether text file should have page numbers.
member.value: **true** to add page numbers to the final text document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.DocumentType
member.summary: Value that indicates the text file type.
member.value: An TextDocumentType enumeration member that indicate the text file type.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Text.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentOptions.Formatted
member.summary: Get or sets a value that indicates whether the text file should be formatted.
member.value: **true** if the text file should be formatted, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit
member.summary: Specifies the measurement unit.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.MM10
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in 1/10mm.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Inch1200
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in 1/1200inches.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Dpi
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in dots per inch.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Pixel
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in pixels.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the compression types for colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use flate compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.LzwJpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use LZW compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Flate
member.summary: Use flate compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Lzw
member.summary: Use LZW compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Jpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use flate compression. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.LzwJpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use LZW compression. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Jpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for compressing colored images. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects
member.summary: Lists object types available for dropping from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropShapes
member.summary: Drop shapes from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropImages
member.summary: Drop images from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropText
member.summary: Drop text from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.None
member.summary: Add all text, images and shapes to the final document (the default value).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode
member.summary: Specifies the font embedding mode used when saving a document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.None
member.summary: No font embedding. Smallest output file size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto
member.summary: Embed fonts that are not commonly available with the exception of Licensed Fonts.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.Force
member.summary: Embed fonts that are not commonly available with Licensed Fonts.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.All
member.summary: Embed all fonts, including the Licensed Fonts with the document. May result in large output file sizes.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes
member.summary: Type (format) of fonts to use.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.Default
member.summary: Default font type. Currently this will be similar to WOFF1

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.WOFF1
member.summary: WOFF version 1 font file format. Supported by all major browsers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.EOT
member.summary: EOF font file format. Supported by older versions of Internet Explorer.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.TTF
member.summary: TTF font file format. Supported by all major browsers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.WOFF2
member.summary: WOFF version 2 font file format. Supported by some of major browsers

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat
member.summary: Specifies the output document formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.User
member.summary: User-defined document format. The User document format is not used inside the LEADTOOLS Document Writers toolkit. An exception will be thrown if User is used as an output document format in the DocumentWriter.BeginDocument method. The User format can however be used as an output format when used in the LEADTOOLS OCR toolkit as a special case to instruct the OCR framework to save the document using the engine native format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Ltd
member.summary: LEADTOOLS Temporary Document. This format creates a temporary file on disk that can later be converted to any of the other formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Pdf
member.summary: Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Doc
member.summary: Microsoft Word 2003 document format (DOC).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Rtf
member.summary: Rich Text Format (RTF).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Html
member.summary: HyperText Markup Language (HTML).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Text
member.summary: Text format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Emf
member.summary: Windows Enhanced Meta File (EMF).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Xps
member.summary: Microsoft Open XML Paper Specification (XPS) (this format requires .NET Framework 3.0 or later).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Docx
member.summary: Microsoft Word Document format (DOCX) (this format requires .NET Framework 3.0 or later and Microsoft Open XML Format SDK 2.*.).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Xls
member.summary: Microsoft Excel 2003 format (XLS).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Pub
member.summary: eBooks format (ePUB).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Mob
member.summary: Mobipocket e-book format (MOB).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Svg
member.summary: Scalable Vector Graphics format (SVG).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.AltoXml
member.summary: ALTO (Analyzed Layout and Text Object) is an XML Schema used by the library of congress to describe OCR text and layout format.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode
member.summary: Specifies the how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.None
member.summary: Apply no rules. The image will be used as is and no detection is perform.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.Strict
member.summary: The document writer will determine if the image is grayscale, if so, it will convert the image to black and white (1 bit per pixel) only if the image contains no grayscale values besides pure black and white.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.Relaxed
member.summary: The document writer will determine if the image is grayscale. If the image has noise or shadows, they will be ignored and the image is converted to black and white (1 bit per pixel).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize
member.summary: Specifies the resize options for the overlay image (image over text).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Original
member.summary: Use original size (no resizing is performed). Output will have highest quality and largest size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Half
member.summary: Resize the image by two and stretch over to cover the page. Output will have the best ratio between quality and size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Quarter
member.summary: Resize the image by 4 and stretch over to cover the page. Output will have the lowest quality and minimum size.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction
member.summary: Specifies the page restriction mode used when saving a document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction.Default
member.summary: Default page restriction, requires emf handle to create document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction.Relaxed
member.summary: Relaxed page restrictions, emf handle is not mandatory to create document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode
member.summary: Specifies the document text mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.Auto
member.summary: The document will be automatically have framed/non-framed text in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents (this is not implemented currently, so Auto will be equivalent to NonFramed).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.NonFramed
member.summary: Flow text in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.Framed
member.summary: Set frame the text blocks (use text box objects) in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType
member.summary: Specifies the document page type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Emf
member.summary: EMF page (DocumentWriterEmfPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Svg
member.summary: SVG page (DocumentWriterSvgPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Raster
member.summary: Raster image page (DocumentWriterRasterPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Empty
member.summary: an Empty page (DocumentWriterEmptyPage).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the HTML document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.IE
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.Netscape
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Netscape Navigator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.IENetscape
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType
member.summary: Indicates the type of the LTD file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Ocr
member.summary: The LTD file was created through the LEADTOOLS OCR engine and contains the data of OCR pages.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Svg
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains SVG pages only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Raster
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains raster pages only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Mixed
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains SVG and raster pages.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the compression types for one bit per pixels images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Flate
member.summary: Use flate compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG31D
member.summary: Use FAX G3_1D compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG32D
member.summary: Use FAX G3_2D compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG4
member.summary: Use FAX G4 compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Lzw
member.summary: Use LZW compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Jbig2
member.summary: Use JBIG2 compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode
member.summary: Specifies the PDF document encryption mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode.RC40Bit
member.summary: Use 40-bit RC4 encryption mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode.RC128Bit
member.summary: Use 128-bit RC4 encryption mode.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType
member.summary: Specifies the page fit option.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.Default
member.summary: Default page fit type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitWidth
member.summary: Fit page width.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitHeight
member.summary: Fit page height.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitWidthBounds
member.summary: Fit page width bounds.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitHeightBounds
member.summary: Fit page height bounds.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitBounds
member.summary: Fit page bounds.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType
member.summary: Specifies the page layout option.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.SinglePageDisplay
member.summary: Display one page at a time.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.OneColumnDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in one column.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoColumnLeftDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoColumnRightDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoPageLeft
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoPageRight
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType
member.summary: Specifies the PDF initial view document page mode type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.PageOnly
member.summary: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.BookmarksAndPage
member.summary: Document bookmarks visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.ThumbnailAndPage
member.summary: Thumbnail images visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.FullScreen
member.summary: Full-screen mode, with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.LayerAndPage
member.summary: Layer panel visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.AttachmentsAndPage
member.summary: Attachments panel visible.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the PDF document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.4.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.PdfA
member.summary: The target document should be PDF/A-1b.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf12
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.2.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf13
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.3.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf15
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.5.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf16
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.6.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the Text document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.Ansi
member.summary: The output text document type is ANSI (contains 8-bit ANSI characters only).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.Unicode
member.summary: The output text document type is UNICODE (contains 16-bit UNICODE characters).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.UnicodeBigEndian
member.summary: The output text document type is UNICODE with Big Endian, the most significant byte (MSB) value is stored at the memory location with the lowest address.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.UTF8
member.summary: The output text document type is UTF8.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo
member.summary: Contains information on an LTD file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo.PageCount
member.summary: Number of pages in the LTD file.
member.value: The number of pages in the LTD file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo.Type
member.summary: Type of the LTD file.
member.value: An LtdDocumentType enumeration member that indicate the type of the LTD file.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating bookmarks in automatic way based on font information of the document when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.BoldStyle
member.summary: Indicates that bookmarks should be created based on whether the font is bold.
member.value: **true** to create bookmarks based on whether the font is bold, otherwise; **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.FontFaceName
member.summary: Typeface name of the font to be considered for the font which will be used for creation bookmark in the PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains typeface name of the font which is used to determine the selected font for creation bookmark. To reset this value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.FontHeight
member.summary: Font height to be considered for the font which will be used when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.
member.value: A FontHeight double value that indicates the font height. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.ItalicStyle
member.summary: Consider italic font style for the selected font while creating bookmark in the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to consider only italic font for the selected font type and size while creating bookmark in the PDF document; **false**, otherwise. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.UseStyles
member.summary: Consider font styles when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow checking for font styles such as bold or italic while creating the bookmark in the PDF document using the automatic bookmarking feature, otherwise; **false** The default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating custom bookmarks based when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.LevelNumber
member.summary: Level number of bookmark item to be created in bookmark for the created PDF document.
member.value: The level number of the bookmark item inside PDF bookmark. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.Name
member.summary: Name of this bookmark item.
member.value: A String which contains the name of this bookmark item. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.PageNumber
member.summary: Page number this custom bookmark refer to in the created PDF document.
member.value: The page number where this custom bookmark item refer to. Must be value greater or equal to 1 and less or equal to the total number of pages in the final PDF document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.XCoordinate
member.summary: Horizontal coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.
member.value: The horizontal coordinate of this bookmark item in points in the PDF page. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.YCoordinate
member.summary: Vertical coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.
member.value: The vertical coordinate of this bookmark item in points in the PDF page. Default value is 0.
